name: Fasembly
description:
Welcome to Fasembly, the game where putting things together saves your life. Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Recipes:

2x Wheel + 1x Engine:  Basic Vehicle

1x Basic Vehicle + 1x Frame:  Cart

2x Basic Vehicle:  Fast Vehicle

1x Fast Vehicle + 2x Frame + 1x Chair: Speeder

1x Fast Vehicle + 2x Frame + 2x Container: Big Cart
